invalidRangeMessage: The range selected cannot be more than 6 days. It has been corrected automatically
calendar-title: To select another date or dates, please click on the calendar
calendar-explanation:
With this calendar, you can either select one or several dates.
To select only one date, please click twice on the same date.
To select multiple dates, click on the starting date and then click on the ending date. Please note that it is not posible to select more than 6 days at a time.
calendar-view-title: Possible schedules for entering or leaving
